column2: It is time for another olympic games. I should send out couriers to spread the word.
It is time again for the olympic games. Should I go and show my finesse to the gods?
No, I can go another time.
There are rumors of a young warrior in the East who wishes to unite all of the Indos under his rule!
The young warrior is here! He considers the Eastern Satrapies as belonging under his rightful rule!
This young upstart will swiftly be put in his place!
